#### 1) Obtain mean score for each study
```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Convert YES/NO values to 1 and 0
master_dat <- master_dat %>% 
  mutate(across(where(is.character),
                ~case_when(. == "Yes" ~ "1",
                           . == "No" ~ "0",
                           TRUE ~ as.character(.))))


```
